error.invalid: Password must be at least 8 characters
Password must be at least 8 characters

200.title: Success
200.message: Your password has been reset successfully, you can now login

400.title: Error
400.message: Invalid request or request timeout. Please try again, if the problem try again later or contact support

500.title: Server Error
500.message: Something went wrong. Please try again later

strength.text: Password must be at least 8 characters long, contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character.
